title: Transition from Adobe Acrobat Sign
content:
Context for the Decision Historically, Simpli.fi has used Acrobat Sign for external documents sent to clients (insertion orders from the Sales Department primarily). It has used DocuSign for internal use cases (HR, Accounting, Legal primarily). Over the last few months, the Digital Workplace team reviewed the following items with stakeholders invested in e-signature tool selection: the user experience (access, UI design, ease of use) support experience (submitting tickets, professional services) administrative burden (Okta, licensing and billing model) feature sets of available e-signature tools (future integrations with Salesforce and Netsuite for Contract Lifecycle Management) As of August 2024, we have confirmed stakeholders' preference in consolidating to DocuSign as our sole e-signature platform for outbound signatures. [PANEL] More questions? Please see our additional FAQâ€™s related to this change.
